description: Triage for a larger issue that requires multiple phases/sub-issues

output.issue_body:
## Description

Implement a new multi-phase feature that requires careful coordination.

## Approach

Break down into phases for manageability.

## Todo

- [ ] Complete all phases

## Iteration History

<!-- iteration_history_start -->
<!-- iteration_history_end -->

sub_issues.title: [Phase 1]: Design and planning
sub_issues.body:
## Description

Design the architecture and create a plan.

## Todo

- [ ] Create architecture diagram
- [ ] Define interfaces

sub_issues.title: [Phase 2]: Core implementation
sub_issues.body:
## Description

Implement the core functionality.

## Todo

- [ ] Implement main logic
- [ ] Add error handling

sub_issues.title: [Phase 3]: Testing and documentation
sub_issues.body:
## Description

Add tests and documentation.

## Todo

- [ ] Write unit tests
- [ ] Write integration tests
- [ ] Update documentation
